name: Mean Green Guacamole Salsa
author: Lindsey Eustace
summary: This is a green salsa I learned while in Mexico. It is a green salsa with avocado and it is delicious! I always make it when we do carne asada. I am always begged for the recipe. Enjoy!
directions: Bring a pot of water to a boil and stir in tomatillos and jalapenos
Boil until tomatillos turn bright green and soft, about 10 minutes
Place cilantro, avocados, cooked tomatillos, and cooked jalapenos into a blender, working in batches if necessary
Add about 1 tablespoon of tomatillo cooking water, or as needed, if salsa is too thick
Stop the blender, and season the salsa with garlic powder and salt to taste
Blend again briefly to mix in the seasonings
Transfer to a bowl for serving
